text: te loko sathe yud'dha karo je'o allaha ane kayamatana divasa para imana nathi lavata, je allaha ane tena payagambare harama (avaidha) kareli vastu'one harama nathi manata, na satya dinane kabula kare che, te loko manthi je'one kitaba apavamam avi che, tyam sudhi ke te'o apamanita tha'i, potani pasethi danda ape
